title: Unable to gift friend D:
body: Long story short, made a new friend, i want to buy them a gift, went to store and clicked gifting center, while choosing recipient, their name didn't pop up on the search bar and the list. They meet requirements to receive a gift but they still don't show up on the list. I tried restarting client, but that didn't work either.

replies.body:
You need to have been friends for at least a full 24 hours before you'll be able to send and receive gifts to people, but there are a [**few other stipulations**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752964) as well. 

> **WHY CAN'T I SEND A GIFT TO MY FRIEND?**
> The following factors determine whether you can send or receive gifts:
> 
> The player receiving a gift needs to have been on your buddy list for at least one day.
> The player sending or receiving a gift cannot be banned or suspended (this includes Instant Feedback System).
> There are also specific rules for different types of gifting:
> 
>** CONTENT GIFTING (Skins, Champions, Rune Pages)**
> 
> To send a gift, you must be at least level 10.
> You can only send up to 10 gifts every 24 hours.  
> You can only receive up to 10 gifts every 24 hours.

> **RP GIFTING**
> 
> To send RP, you must be at least level 15
> You can only send up to 5 RP gifts every 24 hours
> You can only receive up to 5 RP gifts every 24 hours
How kind of you! And it's probably cause you guys weren't friends long enough yet :O
Do you know how long it usually take for client to register it?
